name: Wonderer (FeithGaber)
description:
Wonderer

A simple 2d platformer game based on the HaxeFlixel cross-platform engine. Maps are generated using Python scripts. Unfortunately, the map generator is not available in the browser version (desktop only), so a ready-made map will be used for each location.  

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrows - move.
  • SPACE - attack. 

Gameplay: 

  • White squares - replenish health.
  •  Blue squares - replenish armor.
  • At each location you need to kill the right number of enemies to move on to the next one. At the end, you will have to fight the final boss.
